item.title: CKS/CKA tips
item.description: The fastest way to get nodes Many times, I run "kubectl get nodes" to get nodes I need to connect to make changes. In the question description section of tasks, master nodes and worker nodes are given. I think the fastest way to get nodes and I wasted some time on getting that info from commands. Get events Now kubectl has events command. The events command has intuitive options and less keystokes.
